text: George Alexandru Neagu (born 24 April 1985) is a Romanian retired professional footballer who played as a defender.Dan Alexa la primul antrenament. afcastragiurgiu.ro ==References== ==External links== * * Category:1985 births Category:Living people Category:People from Orăștie Category:Romanian footballers Category:Association football defenders Category:Liga I players Category:Liga II players Category:CS Minerul Lupeni players Category:FC Progresul București players Category:CS Mioveni players Category:FC Internațional Curtea de Argeș players Category:FC UTA Arad players Category:CS Pandurii Târgu Jiu players Category:ACS Poli Timișoara players Category:CS Gaz Metan Mediaș players
title: George Neagu
